Texts.Eng: Bravo. You'll need ^green;a lot of plastic^reset; so keep stocked! Now let's help you see in the dark, shall we?

Sweet. Now that you have a ^orange;Greenhouse^reset; we can really get working! The first plant you'll probably want to make is the ^orange;Bracken Tree^reset;, as the ^orange;Silk^reset; it creates ultimately leads to ^orange;Advanced Plastic^reset;. Without plastic, you're sunk. Silk also sells for a decent profit. Win-Win.
